lyrics:
16 contributorseducation lyricsintro
haha

verse 1
call it education
it was somewhere in between
you gave me some sound advice
but i wasnt listening
after we had capsized
i could tell you how youd fall
well im not sure if i lay to rest
on the ceiling or the wall

verse 2
not quite conversation
it was somewhere in between
you said everything is taught
and i listened patiently
all this dog and pony
were still monkeys the whole time
we could not help from flingin shit
in our modern suits and ties

verse 3
our instincts they were cringin
about how we lived our lives
it didnt seem wed lived enough
to even get to die
all these dense distractions
so beautifully complex
well i love lifes surprises so much
i dont want to know whats ahead â€”ead
see modest mouse liveget tickets as low as 76you might also likechorus
stubborn shouted and said
i dont do what you do i dont know
couldnt really hear highly if you
highly care and you dont
stubborn beauty stubborn beauty
oh very well

verse 4
hardly education
it was somewhere in between
oh i hit the roof but i had
aimed for the ceiling

verse 5
hardly education
all them books i didnt read
they just sat there on my shelf
lookin much smarter than me
good ol nostradamus
he knew the whole damn time
thered always be an east from west
and someone in them fightin
